code: @Override protected void configureValidator(ValidatingProcessor validator) throws Exception {     super.configureValidator(validator).     validator.setSchemaLanguage(XMLConstants.RELAXNG_NS_URI). }

@Override protected void doStart() throws Exception {     super.doStart().     // use relax schema factory by default     if (getSchemaFactory() == null) {         setSchemaFactory(new RELAXNGSchemaFactoryImpl()).     } }
